verses.verse: The Revelation <S%G602><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, to shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> shortly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> come to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5660><s%> and signified <S%G4591><s%> <S%G5656><s%> it by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> bare record <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> of all things <S%G3745><s%> that he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that readeth <S%G314><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of this prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5723><s%> those things which are written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5772><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand <S%G1451><s%>.

Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> Congregations <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> be unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> him which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G3801><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G3801><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is to come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G3801><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, who is the faithful <S%G4103><s%> witness <S%G3144><s%>, and the first begotten <S%G4416><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>. Unto him that loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5660><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> washed <S%G3068><s%> <S%G5660><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> hath made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Kohanim <S%G2409><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>; to him <S%G846><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, he cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> clouds <S%G3507><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5695><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they also which <S%G3748><s%> pierced <S%G1574><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> kindreds <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall wail <S%G2875><s%> <S%G5695><s%> because <S%G1909><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>. Havahn so <S%G3483><s%>, Amen <S%G281><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> am your <S%G5216><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> companion <S%G4791><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the isle <S%G3520><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Patmos <S%G3963><s%>, for <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

I was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the YY's <S%G2960><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of a shofar <S%G4536><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> Alpha <S%G1><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Omega <S%G5598><s%>, the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> thou seest <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a book <S%G975><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5657><s%> it unto the seven <S%G2033><s%> Congregations <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>; unto <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Smyrna <S%G4667><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Pergamos <S%G4010><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Sardis <S%G4554><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Philadelphia <S%G5359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I turned <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> that <S%G3748><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> being turned <S%G1994><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> one like <S%G3664><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, clothed with a garment <S%G1746><s%> <S%G5765><s%> down to the foot <S%G4158><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> girt <S%G4024><s%> <S%G5772><s%> about <S%G4314><s%> the paps <S%G3149><s%> with a golden <S%G5552><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his hairs <S%G2359><s%> were white <S%G3022><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> wool <S%G2053><s%>, as white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> snow <S%G5510><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were as <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto fine brass <S%G5474><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> if they burned <S%G4448><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a furnace <S%G2575><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5740><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> twoedged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> countenance <S%G3799><s%> was as <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> shineth <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> strength <S%G1411><s%>.

Write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5719><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5738><s%> hereafter <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>;

The mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>. The seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> Congregations <S%G1577><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou sawest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Congregations <S%G1577><s%>.
